title: 820-3115 freezing
message:
No liquid damage. When trying to install OSX the machine freezes up completely and looks like this. After shutdown screen will look normal but does same kind of thing again when trying to install OSX

what to check or try for this?

title: 820-3115 freezing
message: RAM issue. Try one RAM stick at a time in each slot and kind of bang on the casing by the trackpad. One RAM slot will likely replicate the issue.

title: 820-3115 freezing
message:
This board has only Intel Graphics.
So any artefacts on image are directly related with DDR3 memory, which is shared for video too.

title: 820-3115 freezing
message: Thank you, new ram solved the problem. This is the first time I ran into this issue.
